formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Tenant ID:
formElement.documentation: ID of the tenant to use.

formElement.label: Number of Servers:
formElement.documentation: Number of servers to deploy. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to server names (default is 1).

formElement.label: Image ID:
formElement.documentation: Id of an existing image in Openstack.

formElement.label: Flavor ID:
formElement.documentation: ID for the flavor to use.

formElement.label: Results tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other deployments stored in the same location (default is $[jobStepId]).

formElement.label: Resource Pool(s):
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created(Space separated list).

formElement.label: Resource workspace:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
